mapper.select: SELECT meetingId, meetingTitle, meetingDay, numOfPeople, maxPeople, meetingPlace, memo, meetingInfo, meetingInfoDetail, creatorId, close, cancel FROM irregularmeeting_view WHERE meetingId = #{meetingId};

SELECT meetingId, meetingTitle, meetingDay, numOfPeople, maxPeople, meetingPlace, memo, meetingInfo, meetingInfoDetail, creatorId, close, cancel FROM irregularmeeting_view WHERE (meetingTitle LIKE #{key} OR memo LIKE #{key}) and close = 0 and meetingInfo=#{category};

SELECT vi.meetingid, vi.meetingtitle, vi.numofpeople, vi.maxpeople, vi.meetingplace, vi.memo, vi.meetinginfo, vi.meetinginfodetail, vi.creatorid, vi.meetingday, vi.close, vi.cancel, count(case when mm.heart = 1 then 1 end) AS heart FROM irregularmeeting_view vi LEFT OUTER JOIN member_meeting mm ON vi.meetingid = mm.meetingid GROUP BY vi.meetingid, vi.meetingtitle, vi.numofpeople, vi.maxpeople, vi.meetingplace, vi.memo, vi.meetinginfo, vi.meetinginfodetail, vi.creatorid, vi.meetingday, vi.close, vi.cancel ORDER BY count(mm.heart) DESC;
SELECT meetingId, meetingTitle, meetingDay, numOfPeople, maxPeople, meetingPlace, memo, meetingInfo, meetingInfoDetail, creatorId, close, cancel FROM irregularmeeting_view ORDER BY meetingId DESC;
